UserAgent.HardcodedValue: Cisco Process Orchestrator 2.3.0.x Web HTTP Request Activity

Configuration.Description: After successful completion of the Commission Virtual Server from Template process, this activity marks the change request complete. This also has the effect of appearing on the console while this process is running as an indication of the progress of the process.
